class.name: UnknownGroupException
class.javadoc: An UnknownGroupException is thrown by methods of classes and interfaces in the java.rmi.activation package when the ActivationGroupID parameter to the method is determined to be invalid, i.e., not known by the ActivationSystem. An UnknownGroupException is also thrown if the ActivationGroupID in an ActivationDesc refers to a group that is not registered with the ActivationSystem Ann Wollrath 1.2 java.rmi.activation.Activatable java.rmi.activation.ActivationGroup java.rmi.activation.ActivationGroupID java.rmi.activation.ActivationMonitor java.rmi.activation.ActivationSystem
indicate compatibility with the Java 2 SDK v1.2 version of class
Constructs an UnknownGroupException with the specified detail message. s the detail message 1.2
